oonawata wada buddhimath wima nisa sinhalayata thaman ge jathiyata idiriyedi athiwana wyasanaya gana kisidu hagimak natha.jathiya aaraksha kirimata anthawadi wiya yuthu natha,jathiwadi wiya yuthu natha,le wagiriya yuthuda natha (le wagirimen oppuwanne owungeda apeda wenasak nomathi bawa pamanaki).jathiyak lesa sinhalayada sithanawanam.jathikathwayata ida denawanam jathiye yaha pawathmata eya mahopakari wanu atha.ugra jathiwadin saha eeniya samawadin(bhayanakama kottashaya mowunya.thamange wasiyata jathiya pawa dena bahutharayak me namin handinwe) madhyastha mathayak daranawanam(jathimamaka) mema prashnaya lesiyenma wisadenu atha(awashya awasthawakadi jathiyak lesa nagisitima memagin adahas kere.sinhalayage ekamuthuwak nathi kama awasthawadin wisin risise sinhalayatama wiruddhawa bhawitha karayi).
